com.facebook.litho

Class TreeFuture<T extends PotentiallyPartialResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.TreeFuture<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LayoutTreeFuture, RenderTreeFuture

    public abstract class TreeFuture<T extends PotentiallyPartialResult>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class that wraps a FutureTask to allow calculating the same result across threads.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<T> mFutureTask

        Calculates a new result for this TreeFuture.

      • isEquivalentTo

        public abstract boolean isEquivalentTo(TreeFuture that)

      • getWaitingCount

        public int getWaitingCount()

      • onGetStart

        protected void onGetStart(boolean isTracing)
        Called before the future's Get is invoked. Will start a trace. Override to implement additional logging before Get, but always call super.

      • onGetEnd

        protected void onGetEnd(boolean isTracing)
        Called after Get is completed. Will end a trace. Override to implement additional logging after Get, but always call super.

      • onWaitStart

        protected void onWaitStart(boolean isTracing)
        Called before Wait starts. Will start a trace. Override to implement additional logging before Wait, but always call super.

      • onWaitEnd

        protected void onWaitEnd(boolean isTracing,
                         boolean errorOccurred)
        Called after Wait ends. Will end a trace. Override to implement additional logging after Wait, but always call super.

      • addSystraceArgs

        protected Systracer.ArgsBuilder addSystraceArgs(Systracer.ArgsBuilder argsBuilder)
        Override to add additional args to a systrace. The args will already include the running thread ID.
